Returns: Minimal value of DatePicker Action or Long.MIN_VALUE if not set.
getMinDate().Description: Get minimal value of DatePicker in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 in @B_java#util#TimeZone#getDefault_E@ time zone. -1 if not set.

Parameters: long: New value to update current value of DatePicker Action.
setDate(long).Description: Sets current value of DatePicker in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 in @B_java#util#TimeZone#getDefault_E@ time zone.

Returns: Format of showing Date, e.g. "YMD". Returns null if using current locale's default.
getDatePickerFormat().Description: Returns format of date Picker or null if not specified. The format is a case insensitive String containing the * day ('d'), month ('m'), and year ('y'). When the format is not specified, a default format of current locale will be used.

getDate().Description: Get current value of DatePicker in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 in @B_java#util#TimeZone#getDefault_E@ time zone.

Returns: Maximum value of DatePicker Action or Long.MAX_VALUE if not set.
getMaxDate().Description: Get maximum value of DatePicker in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 in @B_java#util#TimeZone#getDefault_E@ time zone.

ClassDesc: Subclass of GuidedAction that can choose a date. The Action is editable by default; to make it read only, call hasEditableActivatorView(false) on the Builder.
